hadith.text: It was narrated from Abu Ayyub that a man said:"O Messenger of Allah, tell me of a deed that will gain me admittance to Paradise." The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "Worship Allah and do not associate anything with Him, establish the Salah, pay the Zakah and uphold the ties of kinship. Let go!" - as if he was riding his camel. [1] [1] As if he was riding his camel and the man had grabbed hold of its reins to ask this question
